A collection of software tools, packages, and web applications I have developed or contributed to.

## R Packages

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
### RELSA

R package for Relative Severity Assessment in laboratory animals.

**Features:**

- Multivariate severity scoring
- Reference set comparison
- Visualization tools

[GitHub](https://github.com/mytalbot/RELSA){.btn .btn-outline-primary} [Documentation](https://talbotsr.com/RELSA/){.btn .btn-outline-secondary}
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
### simsalRbim

Preference test simulation and analysis using binary choice combinations

**Features:**

- Binary choice simulation for preference ranking
- Worth value estimation
- Built-in visualizations

[GitHub](https://github.com/mytalbot/simsalRbim){.btn .btn-outline-primary} [Documentation](https://talbotsr.com/simsalRbim/){.btn .btn-outline-secondary}
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
### endpointR

Humane endpoint identification in laboratory animal research

**Features:**

- Body weight trajectory analysis
- Time-series anomaly detection
- Interactive Shiny app available

[GitHub](https://github.com/mytalbot/endpointR/){.btn .btn-outline-primary} [Documentation](https://talbotsr.com/endpointR/){.btn .btn-outline-secondary}
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
### CMS (Composite Measures Schemes)

Severity assessment via composite scoring in animal research


**Features:**

- PCA-based feature selection
- Cluster analysis for composite scores
- Comparative severity visualization

[GitHub](https://github.com/mytalbot/cms/){.btn .btn-outline-primary} [Documentation](https://talbotsr.com/cms/index.html){.btn .btn-outline-secondary}
:::
:::

:::
